data.text: Mègabiã ŋu ame vɔ̃ɖiwo o,
elabena woƒe dzi ɖoa nu tovo
Nunya wotsɔna tua xɔe
to sidzedze me wotsɔa nu nyui tɔxɛ siwo mebɔ o
Ŋusẽ gã aɖe le nunyala si
Èhiã nufiame hafi adze aʋa eye hafi dziɖuɖu nava la,
Nunya kɔ boo na bometsila akpa;
Ame si ɖo vɔ̃ be yeawɔ
Bometsinuwo ɖoɖo nye nu vɔ̃ eye amewo tsria fewuɖula.
Ne èʋuʋu le xaxaɣi la,
Ɖe ame siwo wokplɔ yina wuwu ge
Ne ègblɔ be,
Vinye, no anyitsi elabena enyo;
Nyae hã be, nunya avivi wò luʋɔ nu;
Mègade xa ɖe ame dzɔdzɔe ƒe aƒe ŋu o,
elabena togbɔ be ame dzɔdzɔe adze anyi zi adre hã la,
Mègakpɔ dziɖuɖu ƒe dzidzɔ ne wò futɔ dze anyi o,
elabena Yehowa akpɔe, eye madze eŋu o,
Mègadzo nyanyanya le ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ta
elabena mɔkpɔkpɔ aɖeke meli na ame vɔ̃ɖi ɖe etsɔ si gbɔna ŋuti o
Vinye, vɔ̃ Yehowa kple fia la
elabena ame eve mawo ana gbegblẽ naƒo ɖe wo dzi kpoyi
Esiawo hã nye nunyalawo ƒe nyagbɔgblɔwo:
Ame si agblɔ na fɔɖila be,
Ke eme anyo na ame siwo abu fɔ agɔdzela
Nyaŋuɖoɖo ɖe ɖoɖo nu le
Wu wò gotadɔwo nu
Mègaɖu ɖasefo ɖe hawòvi ŋu dzodzro
Mègagblɔ be,
Meto kuviatɔ kple ame manyanu
ŋu vu tsyɔ afi sia afi,
Metsɔ nye dzi ɖo nu si mekpɔ la ŋu
Dɔ alɔ̃ vie, dɔ akɔlɔ̃e sẽe,
tete ahedada aƒo ɖe dziwò abe adzodala ene,
